keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Some question whether Mr. Kerrey, a former senator who has admitted that he and commandos he led in 1969 killed women and children, should lead Fulbright University Vietnam.

headline.print_headline: War Record Fuels Debate Over University Appointment in Vietnam
headline.main: Bob Kerrey’s War Record Fuels Debate in Vietnam on His Role at New University

snippet: Some question whether Mr. Kerrey, a former senator who has admitted that he and commandos he led in 1969 killed women and children, should lead Fulbright University Vietnam.
abstract: Vietnamese bristle at appointment of former United States Sen Bob Kerrey, who was involved with killing of innocent women and children as Navy SEAL during Vietnam War, to lead new American-backed university in country; some view situation as chance to forgive Kerry, who says he will step down if controversy undermines project.
